KH.content: leave khōra untranslated, thinking & translation here traverse the same experience/experiment (expérience): “place,” “location,” “region,” “country” & its figures, “mother,” “nurse,” “receptacle,” “imprint-bearer” [see p. 126, these figures not even true figures]

GT.content: can one ask these questions (i.e. what is a gift?) w/out anticipating a thought?

R.content: Aristotle’s Prime Mover, the first desirable, gives a life that exceeds the life of a human, continuous, unending—for us, impossible
energeia of this pure activity is “pleasure (hēdonē), circle of taking pleasure in oneself (jouissance de soi); a specular auto-affection that accords w/ thinking of thought

MONL.content: for Heidegger, Zusage primary to question, the most irreducible in thought

H.content: p. anne 28 “thought is in essence a force of mastery…breaking up the unknown to possess it, shed light on it, name it”
pp. anne 54-6 step beyond border, threshold, because inability to mark a stable territory provokes thought
p. anne 152 a place of haunting has no ghosts, ghosts come where they are excluded, death haunts us by remaining unthought

OOG.content: phenomenology never had to learn that Thought would always be to come

SPOM.content: no pure identity if that which is most living have specters inside, weighed down by specters, which think
jurer ou conjurer: the chance of thinking and its limit? the gift of its finitude? [nous gageons ici que la pensée ne vient jamais à bout de la pulsion conjuratoire]
via Marx, practical events, where thought becomes act (se fait agir); thought as Handeln in Heidegger

POOF.content: via Aristotle’s prótē philía as teleía philía, telos of friendship as that which can’t be reached, inconceivable, self-contradictory, would be the desire for a perfect friend, for a friendship w/ God [Derrida offers 3 reasons why this is impossible]

if man has friends, it’s because he thinks the other, thought of the other as thought of the mortal, and thus there is only thought in friendship > “O my friends…” the declaration of God, who knows only divine friendship

POR.content: reason only one species of thought

“thinking” requires both principle of reason and what’s beyond it, both archē and an-archy > decision [of thought] always risks the worst, to claim to erase the risk by institutional program is to create a barricade against a future

MPM.content: thinking, not bereaved interiorization, thinks at boundaries, thinks the boundary, the limit of interiority
Heidegger: is memory a container for thought [Gedachtes]? or does thinking rest in memory [Gedächtnis]?
Heidegger rethinks “thought (Gedanke)” w/ Gedanc, bottom of the heart, gathering together of all that concerns us, more original than Pascal’s thinking of heart? [Dank]

VM.content: for face to present other w/out metaphor, speech must not only translate thought, thought must already be speech
dissociation of thought and language, subordination of latter to former, is proper to philosophy of finitude [Cartesian Cogito of 3rd Meditation]

classical infinitism of Cartesian type, thought goes much further much faster than language [thought vs. body (language)?], would handle questions re: Levinas’ other by neutralizing space to liberate positive infinity

Greek logos not accidental for any thought; Greek miracle is impossibility for any thought to treat its sages as “sages of the outside” > by proferring epekeina tes ousias, by welcoming alterity into heart of logos, it has protected itself against every surprising convocation

VP.content: Husserl tormented by possibility that writing inhabits inside of speech, itself at work in intimacy of thought

PAS.content: event (de-distance of near) (Eriegnis, Entfernung, Enteignis) “before” which philosophy and its pas au déla (thought) are trying to close themselves

S.content: Heidegger: the more original the thought, the richer its unthought, the unthought is the highest gift a thought can give
to name spirit is to offer for thinking, German only language in which spirit comes to name itself
promise as the promise of the day before the day before; acc. Heidegger, there’s a “must” a “we must think” of the promise, thought as fidelity to promise > must hear & obey

PPHS.content: Hegel: German language bestowed direct kinship btwn Gedächtnis and Gedanke
Hegel: “we think in names” [magic?] ex: “lion” [Hegel contradicts privilege of sign?]
Hegel: number is pure thought of thought’s externalization, in number sense is brought closest to thought > thoughtlessness, indifference, number remains sensuous

SH.content: the resistance thought of “once” gives one to think, let’s let ourselves be approached by this offering

philosophy finds itself in vicinity of poetic, of literature, the blurred border (no place, utopia) btwn empirical (contingency of the outer) and necessary (necessity of inner) > indecision of this limit most provokes thought [Derrida attacks the idea that philosophy loses itself there]

FWT.content: safe and sound—beautiful freedom of human thought [juxtaposed to physiologistic determinism] [Scientology, Going Clear] [moral image of thought]

POS.content: Derrida’s suspicion of “thought,” that it means nothing, that it is logocentric > substantified void of highly derivative ideality [Deleuze’s moral image of thought]

OS.content: Heidegger designates milieu of self-evidence, outside which thought suffocates > has not entire philosophy been authorized on “extraordinary right” of present? for Heidegger, it’s not a question of thinking otherwise, it’s thinking that which could not have been, nor thought, otherwise ——the impossibility of the otherwise produces a trembling, a question of tout autre, think the tie btwn truth/presence, in a thought that doesn’t need to be true/present [no skeptical moment]

transition from parousia to absolute subjectivity does not disrupt Aristotelianism: prime mover, presence, desire, eros, “desire is desire of presence,” absolute subjectivity, circle, return to self, parousia as self-presence > prime mover, noēsis noēseōs, as subject

ROP.content: thought conditioned (exercent) by fidelity, fidelity honed (aiguisent) by thought

ATIA.content: to think the war we find ourselves waging [against animals] is not only a duty, no one can escape it: thinking, perhaps, begins when animal looks at us and we are naked before it

properly phenomenological logic of “I am” means there is only “I think” > breath, life are secondary: “I breathe, therefore I am” concludes nothing > indubitability of existence depends on thought (not being-in-life)

FS.content: for Leibniz, man is finite in act, infinite in thought; in God act/thought coexist

WAP.content: “thinking,” which entitles only this “no” of no pure instance, must, in the name of a democracy to come, “unremittingly interrogate” (that is deconstruct) the de facto democracy, its determinations > event/promise whose singularity doesn’t signify (self-) presence

CHM.content: madness rejected form very interiority of thought itself [Foucault on Descartes]
Montaigne haunted by thought of going mad in very action of thought itself

for Descartes, thinking and saying what is clear & distinct is same thing—Derrida adds that, for St. Anselm, the insipiens, the insane man, couldn’t think because he couldn’t think what he said > madness as voluble silence that couldn’t think its own words

Gii.content: Heidegger: thinking is genuine activity, lend a hand to the essence
thinking of the hand, hand of thinking > thinking of human Geschlecht (not a humanism? or not a metaphysical, classical humanism?)

acc. Heidegger, sciences belong to essence of technology, not to technology—to its essence; technology remains plunged in a fog (noyée dans un brouillard) > we still do not think (science, no one, is responsible for this) > the most thought-provoking (das Bedenklichste): we still do not think ——for Heidegger, thinking as work of cabinetmaker (Schreiner), a joiner, attune to hidden plenitude of wood’s essence as it enters inhabited site, Handwerk
Heidegger: the hand is constantly in danger, writing of poetry too
to think is a handiwork [w/out any perhaps] > elsewhere in Heidegger, thought is linked to Lichtung, to eye, or to hearing/voice—now to hand
thinking is neither cerebral nor disincarnate
for Heidegger, hand thinks before being thought > it is thought, a thought, thinking
Heidegger: only when man speaks does he think, not the other way around, as metaphysics still believes
Heidegger: work of hand, thought, man’s hardest & simplest work
hand gives & gives itself: animal rationale can only take, grasp [anti-Hegel, whose concept is the graspable] [Derrida refers to GT, where giving & taking are problematized]
acc. Heidegger, Socrates is purest thinker of West, wrote nothing, placed himself in the draft—withdrawing movement, in Zug (pull) of withdrawal (des Entziehens)
logo-phonocentrism in Heidegger: writing declines thought, escapes draft when it enters literature [Derrida briefly directs us to Heidegger’s meditation on chreōn, Brauch, necessity, logos]
for Heidegger, philosophy & science never attain the parallelism, the cutting/breaching (into one another), of thinking/philosophy (Denken) & poetry (Dichten)

DST.content: thinking of translation, experience of thinking itself, its most essential & risky passage, where experience of thinking is also poetic experience: privileged examples (in Lacoue-Labarthe): Gestell, mimesis, rhuthmos
[re: Lacoue-Labarthe’s désistance] exemplary, superior probity that, w/out ceding to dogmatic moralism, submits ethical demand to trial (l’épreuve) of thought
Derrida has his doubts when Lacoue-Labarthe argues that Heidegger’s unthought (impensé) gathers in unity of single site, as if there were only one unthought for each “great” thought—as its secret law

Derrida wonders if Heidegger’s insistence on Ort, Erörterung, a unique site of gathering, leaves un-thought désistance or dislocation, which might be thought itself [this torments Derrida’s respect for Heidegger, along w/ Derrida’s insufficient concern re: authentic thought]

RM.content: neighborhood (voisinage, Nachbarschaft) of Dichten and Denken: vicus, veicus, which perhaps refers to oikos and Sanskrit veca

entamées, les deux parallèles se coupent à l’infini, se recoupent, s’entaillent: each one [Denken and Dichten] signs in some way in the body of the other, the one in the place (au lieu) of the other: sign there the contract w/out contract of their neighborhood

PF.content: only know what thought means by way of what resists/remains to be thought, thought remains to be thought

HLP.content: trying to think, by answering for its memory [re: history of the lie]

TR.content: event & calculable program (machine) together > no future w/out this thought
event-machine: change very name of what we call “thought” (now a homonym, paleonym)

IW.content: Rosenzweig sees Cohen as a philosopher-teacher who reminds us of the abyssal risk of thought or existence

PJP.content: “re-mind”: already a mnemotechnics at heart of & not outside the thinking of thought [cf. Nietzsche’s On the Genea…]

D.content: no one can enter Soller’s Numbers who thinks literature/thought ought to exorcise the machine (that the 2 have nothing to do w/ each other)

LI.content: thought, relation to other, “experience” of differance

TN.content: the move from body extension to extension of psyche/thinking is incommensurable > a place (lieu) neither of objective space nor extension: place (lieu) as spacing before space
Nancy: “the incommensurable extension of thinking is the opening of the mouth” > mouth as union of soul/body; Nancy accords decisive authority to “quasi” in Descartes’ “quasi permixtio”
Nancy moves from Psyche is extended to body weighs (i.e. thinks) [penser, peser]
Nancy: “la pensée pèse exactement le poids du sens” (Derrida points out transitive/intransitive double meaning of pèse)
Diderot, in tradition of Anaxagoras: “man thinks because he has hands”
insistence that comes down to thinking, no longer a simple rhetorical movement
malgré la pensée, thought thinks only in spite of itself, never begins by itself [Nancy’s peser]

NOY.content: when thought and the word (la parole) given in writing merge (se confond) at the heart of the same time (au coeur du même temps)

OG.content: [vis-à-vis Heidegger] thought of trace, perfectly neutral name, never has weight in system, blank part of text: what we already know we haven’t done
thinking (what we already know we haven’t begun), “mesuré à la taille de l’écriture, s’entame seulement dans l’epistémè” > in a certain manner, thought gives you nothing to say

ATAP.content: for Heidegger, thought (not philosophy) essentially eschatological

EU.content: for Schelling, thinking as Einbildungskraft, as post-Kantian originary unity > all differences translations of same > post-critical, critique of critique
most post-Kantians (incl. Nietzsche [?]) claim to have already reached the inaccessible: to think finitude, you have already thought the infinite (this becomes definition of thinking)
post-Kantians accuse Kant of founding “criticism” in denegation, more responsible to found thought in inaccessible
[CIPH] no preinterpretation, “thinking” as what questions philosophy > indeterminate opening (experimental incursions in unexplored areas)

CHOR.content: [cf. WBH p. 198] could femininity, however irreducible it may be, remain derived from or subordinated to question of destination or thought of gift?
Derrida uses word “thought,” which is also excessive, instead of philosophy, theory, logic, structure, scene
